content.detailedDescription: I was asleep, then i awoke to see these short statured men witha odd coloring.  they surrounded me, and the light was white in color it was picking me up and i felt, as now in my current experience as being shot at for the first time your mind shuts down and you can't react with cognitive thought.  i was being taking somehow with out being in physical contact with a ladder or a net or anything thing it sucked.  then as i was about to be taken through my window and out to the fire ball outside and presumably into the craft my higher brain functions came back to me i grabing the wall around the window and tryed to stop them from taking me at first my hand went right through the wall and then to their surprise my hands actualy stoped on the wall.  i feel after that about 6 feet to the floor.  the beings attempted to pick me  up and bring me back into the light beam. but i punched the being that had grabbed my left arm in the eye.  it startled him i could actualy see a unsure reaction on him.  the his buddy on the right attempted to put me into a paralysis state agian and failed.  i then stood up and started to fight these beings, they were my same hieght at my age of 11.  i appeared to have broken one of the beings legs.  they then gave up and left my room.  i didnt know it but my little brother had witnessed what had just happened and what i had done to them.  they have never come again since that day,  i believe i am a oddity to them they coulnd;t control me.  i am shaking writing this right nwo
content.summary: They atempted to take me again after failing about 23 times prior

content.detailedDescription:

i watched them for 4 hours last night and they captured the famous phoenix lights again.

out of the 5 different webcams available only two areas were of interest.
camelback mountain and south mountain.
in both of these webcams many ufos were recorded and seen.
i will start with the camelback webcam high res shots.

these first three showed the craft showing up and i believe they are single ships not one large one.
the reason is they break off and fly down near the the mountains and it the pictures to follow you will see what i'm taking about.

these are great locations to view the sky and capture the craft.
if someone could get web cams up with continous feeds in these areas we would see some fantastic ufo video.

more photos to follow.
thanks
content.summary: 4 hours of ufo activity over phoenix last night recorded on webcams

content.detailedDescription:
Our power was out do to late payment that night. i was alone in the back patio sitting in a patio chair listening to my headphones and enjoying the cool night air, was not much else to do.
  first i will tell you that i am very familure with the night sky and can tell the difference between planets, stars satalights and different aircraft. i have been through private pilot and cival air patrol ground schools and have had over 60 or so flight hours in private pilot training, and familure with what lights aircraft should and are required to be equiped with and what each lights function and meaning is etc.
   on the night of my sighting the sky was clear and i was sitting back looking up at the stars while enjoying my radio station. i was facing up and out to the east.
   i noticed some movement in the corner of my left eye, i faced that way and saw what looked like and moved like 4 bright white satalights moving in perfect formation across the sky at a speed a little faster than satalights move across the sky. the formation was that of a perfect triangle with the fourth light dead center. all the lights (3 points and 1 center) were identicle in size, color ( white with slightest hent of blue) and brightness.
   as i have no way of knowing the size i cant make an estamate on the altitude or speed. but i got the sence it was pretty high and cruzin at a good speed, if i put my hand up to the sky the object would be equivalent in length as the width of 1 1/2 fingers.
   the object had only these lights and they stayed solid. no red/green wing tip possition lights, anticollision or any other for that matter.
    the object moved in a straight line to the south east crossing my view of the sky at an angle. i was very confused as to what it could be, i took out my headphones ( volume was not high so i had no ringing in ears from radio station) and listened for sounds of engines which i should have been able to hear if it was a passenger jet, prop plane or rotocraft even if distant i can always hear aircraft in the sky in this area even if distant, but heard nothing, this is also a quiet neighborhood.
   i still figured that just maybe it could be a newly deployed satalight. i have seen on the nasa channel where a satalight would be deployed by  being released in a case where the case comes apart and the parts drift appart leaving the satalight. 
  but i was convinced it was not some kind of conventional aircraft or space junk moving in formation when after about 15 or 20 seconds the craft rotated approx 90 degrees to the right on its axis ( the center light ) over the period of about 3 seconds. at that point it stoped rotating and was still flying in the exact same line of travel and speed but now sideways. facing almost south west but traveling on to the south east.
   it continued on for about 10 seconds in this configuration then just like it did before it now rotated on its axis left back to its origional configuration now facing its line of travel. 
    i was realy excited to see this because i knew for sure it was not any satalight or aircraft i have ever seen. i was thinking this is ither some out of this world craft (cool) or something brand new that we had (also cool), and if it is something we have it has to be using some new kind of propulsion to be able to rotate and fly sideways so smoothly like that, and if it is ours that is also very exciting to me as someone that loves aircraft and flying. 
     it continued on to the south east untill it was out of site.  both of the crafts rotations were the same speed (about 3 seconds) and smooth, never seeming to have an effect on its straight line of travel or speed.
   the best i can compair it to would be a tank moving down the highway and the turret being able to swivel left and right without effecting the speed or course of the vehicle. only what i saw was what appeared to be an entire aircraft do the same.
     in my aircraft i can do what is called a crab which is where you give full left or right rudder and opposite aileron to put the aircraft in a slightly sideways configuration, but only about 10-20 degrees or so and at the expense of speed, it creates major drag and is used sometimes to drasticly slow the aircraft, usualy for a landing where you may be coming in a little high, it allows you to loose some altitude and speed do to drag quickly.
   i know of no aircraft that put itself in a sideways configuration at high speed without breaking apart. some aircraft can hover and fly sideways at very very slow speeds and some rotocraft but not at high speeds in the hundreds of miles per hour or faster.
  because of the size of craft do to altitude and limited number of stars out at night in our sky arround here i did not get a chance to see it cross over a stationary star to see if it would block it out, i did watch for that but it did not cross any stars in its line of flight from my point of view. this might have helped rule out separate objects doing formation ( very impressive formation ) flying but i realy got the sence it was a single solid object.
  also the lights on the craft all maintained thier brightness during the entire sighting across the sky. satalights i see will usualy blink or fade, these lights did not.
   i dont know for sure what i saw that night but it was deffidently making deliberate movements making me believe it was controlled by something or someone.
  also for refference the crafts line of travel was south east with the line taking it over or just slightly north of bfl meadows field, rather than right over the city of bakersfield. if anything it would have skirted the area of bakersfield on its northern edge.
  i have included a picture i made on a paint program showing the crafts appearence, line of travel and movements. what i actualy seen looked a bit more distant than it appears in the pic. consider it a somewhat zoomed in look at exactly what i seen. also the possitions in the sky where the craft changed its configuration was much more distant from each other than what you see in the pic, it was about 10 seconds between the left and right rotations and the craft was seen for a total of about 50 seconds to 1 minute which covered the entire line of sight of sky i could see which was quite a bit.
content.summary: Maintained straight line course and speed, but rotated piviting on its axis flying sideways for part of sighting.

content.detailedDescription: These pictures were captured by a webcam set up to veiw south mt az.These ufos seem to be here every night!

content.detailedDescription: I was in eagle point at my girlfriend brittneys house. we were watching t.V but we decided to go out and watch the stars so we went out and laid down on a blanket we were watching this big thing moving down and across the sky at first we thought it was probably just an airplane but then it got closer and closer and we could see that it wasnt an airplane it was big and kind of diamand shaped with glowing lights it appeared as if it were just hovering like it was taking in information about what it was looking at i felt so afraid i started crying because i seriously thought it was aliens or somthing but then it started going farther and farther out into the sky until finaly it was gone.
content.summary: Huge space ship like thing it had lots of lights on it neon green lights

content.detailedDescription:
Stoplight; cheateau and front street: hovering light about two miles away, near the missouri river at the cheateau bridge.
i thought it was a police helicopter because it just stayed there, maybe 10 or so seconds. my wife looked.
the light looked like a police helicopter spotlight, except extremely bright. the light took a slight curving motion and then absolutely went warp drive following the missouri river, gone in maybe 1/10th of a second. i know what i saw, my wife thinks she saw it. 
that's all i have.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Extremely bright light

content.detailedDescription: I was at lake havasu looking at stars thru my telescope, when i noticed with the naked eye a bright star low on the southern horizon. after locating it with the telescope i was astonished to see it was actually a cluster of lights. it then started moving west to east and i was able to track it thru the scope for about 2 minutes til it faded away in the eastern horizon.  this was also witnessed by my wife and daughter who also described it as 6 or 7 brighter lites on the leading edge in the shape of a boomerang, followed by about a dozen dimmer lites close behind which were clustered together. it was traveling much faster than any of the airliners which fly overhead, and seemed to be more distant and  outside of our atmosphere. i've been looking for reports and wonder if anyone else may have seen this.
content.summary: Bright star to the naked eye, but a cluster of lights thru telescope

content.summary: Ufo hovers on top of bulding caught on web cam

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were just leaving my parents house after thanksgiving dinner. i looked towards the east and first noticed a star-like light moving from north to south. after only a couple of seconds, i noticed four or five objects just under the southward moving light. they appeared to be approximately 1/8" in size at arm's length moving rapidly from south to north at about 30 degrees up above the horizon. they appeared to be partially illuminated (either self illuminated or lit from the ground). after moving together in a locked formation for around two seconds, they moved independently similar to a flock of birds. they seemed to glow a little bit like embers and faded away. i was excited at first because i thought that it was a ufo. i then thought they must be birds after they started to move independently. my wife thought they weren't birds because she said that birds sleep at night. upon reflection, i think they may not have been birds but then again they may have been.
content.summary: Four or five objects in diamond shape broke up into wandering parts

content.detailedDescription: Opening eve of firearms deer season. in the middle of the huron national forest.  around 930 pm noticed a large elongated triangle hovering above tree line.  maybe 20 feet above trees flying completly silent.  triangle shape with multiple white lights outlining the craft.  the head of the ship had a massive spot light pointing toward the earth.  less than a quarter of a mile away, roughly the size of a bus, (very rough guess).  watched it for around 10 seconds as it slowly flew out of my vision.  will never forget what i saw.
content.summary: Massive triangle shape, spot light

content.detailedDescription: I woke up last night. it was about 2 pm but i'm not exactly sure. i woke up from a very bright light that filled out the whole room. the minute i saw the light i was sure it was directed at me- the angle it was positioned at was in such a way that i saw it as soon as i opened my eyes, shining down on me through the window. i did not feel threatened but amused, and fell back asleep immediately. i only remember thinking " i have to check if there is a streetlight that could cause this". but at the same time, i knew already that it wasn't a streetlight as it was too bright, and i had never noticed lamps like that before. i woke up about two hours later, and the same oval object was still present, shining down on me. i fell back asleep and woke up at 5.30 am, when it was gone. i checked for lamps, streetlights, or any object that could have caused the light but could see nothing but the open sky. the object was situated above the treetops, or above our neighbor's house. it didn't move. it seemed to be investigating or searching something ( thus the bright light). there was a strange energy since the light was extremely bright and white. i was sure that i (our house) was an object under investigation.
content.summary: Stagnangt very bright oval light directed at our house or even me, while sleeping, light filled up the whole room, remained there for approx 2 hours.

content.detailedDescription:
it was a hot summer night in hungary. i was in the middle of the countryside on a slope of a hill, surrounded by forrests and vineyards. there was a beautiful panoramic view of a big lake called, balaton. i was at this family vinyard, with my boyfriend and we were sleeping in a tent. i would like to point out also, that there was no electricity, no water, none of the comforts of the 21st century. you could only reach this part of the country if you travelled on a bad quality dirt road, and if you walked a good bit after. so there we were sleeping inside a small tent. 
 around 3 am i walk up because of some strange, extremelly strong scanning light shone through the tent, making me feel that i was light through like in an x-ray examination. i was trying to move, but my body was strongly paralized, so for some time i was just laying there listening to the very mechanical, very loud sound, like that of an airplane turbine, but somehow softer, and i was wondering, what on earth was happening outside. i also have to state that due to my beleive in christianity at that time, i would have considered myself as a "born-again" christian, who doesn't beleive in that obvious hoax that extraterrestrial beings would manifest in the form of ufos. so first i thought there must be a big airplane of some sorts landed outside on the field in the night, which was quite strange at this location. so i gathered my strenght, and was trying to wake up my boyfriend who was not reacting at all. i was trying to shake him up, i was shouting at him, but nothing. also, i was still feeling strongly paralized, so this experience was turning into a nightmare. i was really afraid of some unseen force that was outside the tent. by this time i kind of crawled to the entrance of the tent, and was really struggling to open the zip, due to my lack of force. once i managed to open the tent and looked outside there was complete darkeness, like nothing have happened a few minutes ago. i clambered outside, still difficultly moving, and sat on the grass beside the tent, looking around. there was a small white holidayhouse on my right about 6-8 meters away, and as i looked at that direction, my fear suddenly reached a peakpoint. i was looking at a creature in the moonlight that was 2-3meters tall, standing on two feet, kind of dark skinned, very alongated head, but absolutely non human looking. this creature was looking at me, i was looking at the creature...And the fear i felt was so immense, that i felt an instant urge to let my bowels loose...Really crazy. i have never felt this strong fear before, an all engulfing fear shaked my body like a leaf, and i had to turn my head off this vision. the only thing my mind was constantly telling me, that it is not possible, you don't beleive in aliens!You don't beleive in ufos!
the next thing i remember i was laying in the tent silently murmoring that this is impossible...Then i fall asleep, or rather stumbeled into a comalike sleep. the next day, when we wake up, i was discussing the event with my boyfriend who saw and heard nothing, making me feel rather stupid. nonetheless we walked around looking for clues. the only thing that we found at the exact spot where i observed this being was a front leg of a small deer. it wasn't torn  offbut cut off with a sharp object, looked very fresh, but no signs of blood, or dried blood was visible, witch was quite odd. and later that day i also noticed a tiny cross-shaped scar of a cut on my skin, between the inner corner of my eye and my nose, which was reather scary. after this i was trying tu burry these traumatizing memories for years, untill now. maybe one day i will be able to find out what exactly happened wiht me and my boyfriend.
content.summary: A very bright, blinding, paralizing light shone through the tent i was sleeping in with my boyfriend. i heard a loud, strange noice, like the sound of some sort of buzzing. i couldn't move, i got paralized for some time. tryng to wake up my boyfriend,but

content.detailedDescription: I was flying from phoenix, az to buffalo, ny and took a picture out the window.  the flight left at 9am pdt on october 10, 2007.  the attendant said on the loudspeaker that electronic devices could be used, so i decided to get some pictures from the window.  i took a total of five pictures out the window, starting at 10:06am pdt and ending at 12:50pm pdt. everything went well, possibly the best flight i have ever been on.  i didn't notice anything at the time.  i first noticed the objects when uploading the pictures to my flickr page.  i was going through them and came across one of them taken at 10:12am pdt.  i thought something happened when uploading, but went to the originals and the objects were there too.  i first thought that the objects were meteroites or space junk, then i thought it was military formation flying.  could even be a reflection.  many people have told me the same and some said it was ice coming off the wing.  one suggested this website and report to see if anyone could help.  thank you for your time and look forward to hearing from you.
content.summary: Something falling through the atmosphere

content.detailedDescription: My father and mother and myself were working in the yard finishing up the lawn when i noticed a light like a airliner on approach to hector air port in fargo nd aprox 25 miles from my house.I went back to cleaning up stuff thinking the jet will be over head soon,when i looked again in 5 mins it was not as close as it should have been so being a airplane nut it peaked my curiosity and i began watching closer,when it finaly gotten closer i told my dad to look and my mother also, and we all stood under this thing as it glided over us blocking the sky as it passed it was a diamond shape or like a hopeless diamond lifting body type but absolutly quiet, the cockpit was backlit and was a wraparound like a b2 bomber cockpit.We were stunned and didnt speak a word about it until the next day when i couldnt take it anymore,my father was a career army man started on the beach at normandy to vietnam and was in army intel in germany and said he had never seen anything like it ever,my mother was in the army also and attached to white sands nm and had been to all the v2 tests with a doctor colonel and took notes for him and had seen all sorts of craft but never like this thing, we talked about it and concluded we had seen a ufo, we were changed people, we new that either our government was producing craft that was no were near what was being seen ie f-15  or any other hi tech planes,or we seen a real craft from not of this earth or time. i am 42 yrs old now and i am not sure of the dates but i called my mother tonight and asked about it and she sounded shocked that i brought this up and she said she thinks about that night often we think it was between 1976-1979 but in the summer around july
content.summary: Silent,wrap around cockpit,black,5 to10 mph,200ft height diamond

content.detailedDescription:
My name is steven, i have never told anyone besides my family and one best friend, what i am going to report here. i am 41 years old, i am a very private person and in no way want any attention over this!

i currently live in las vegas nv, my story began in lompoc california near vandenberg afb. i believe i was 8 years old because i was in the 3rd grade so this was 1974 i believe. 

my oldest sister linda had recently had been married and i inherited her room, i had bunk beds in my old room but this room was bigger so my bunk beds where broke down into 2 beds one on each side of my room. i remember quite vividly the bed covers on the beds my mom made them, they had ww1 era airplanes on them. i don���t remember how long i had been in this room when i had this encounter.

on this particular night i slept in the bed near the window as i slept in which ever bed struck my fancy that night. i remember waking from a deep sleep in the middle of the night, i turned my head towards the window and standing there outside my window as clear as day staring me in the face is what i know now as a "grey alien" and mind you this is several years before close encounters of a 3rd kind was released (not that i would have been able to watch it my mom never would have let me see that kind of movie back then) i remember it as if it was yesterday it was so clear he was looking right at me in the face, i remember big black eyes with a bald brow crunched up like it had a scowl on its face, with it's head tilted to one side. i rolled out of bed crawled across my floor opened the door and ran into my parents room where i announced i would never go in my room again because there is a monster outside my window! 

i did not sleep in my room for weeks until my father had enough and insisted i sleep in my own room. this could be blown off as just a bad dream or an over active imagination as my parents tried to do. but i suffered from what i know now as post traumatic syndrome for several years with very livid extreme night terrors and very strange sleep walking events that lasted well into my teenage years, not to mention i did not sleep anywhere near a window until i was married when i was 21.

this event changed my life i never felt safe after this in my own room and once in awhile i will have a panic attack at night and have no idea why, i do not think more than a few days have ever past that i have not thought about that night 33 ago.

the second event happened around 10 years ago. i had recently gone through a bad divorce and had lost a house to forcloser, me and a friend where crashing at his uncles house and had just started a new job. on this particular night the old house we where staying was hot (summer in vegas with no ac on) so i elected to sleep in the back yard in a lawn chair. 

this is where it gets a lil foggy i do not know if i fell asleep. but all i remember is standing in the middle of the back yard and i am looking at a glowing orange ufo disk shape (i see these described as a plasma ufo) slowly flying over my head and of to the north, it made no sound and it was only maybe 100-150 feet of the ground. i remember i was not exited it gave me a feeling of being very uneasy not exited like you would imagine i watched it slowly fly away at maybe 40 miles an hour.

i went into the house and watched t.V. until my friend woke. i did not tell him for a few days, i am not sure why. 

the events i have reported here are true i in no way seek anything, or any attention. both these events have rocked my very core beliefs, as i get older i for some reason have been thinking more of these events and want to know why i have seen both an alien and such a clear ufo. if you tell someone you have had more than one alien/ufo experience it completely changes the way they look at you. i no longer talk about this to my family because it upsets my oldest daughter. 

i have spent many years wondering about what i seen, i don���t know if they come from another planet or if that kind of travel is even possible. i am sharing these events in this forum so maybe i can understand and maybe help someone else understand what we are seeing.

best regards  steven b.
content.summary: 2 events one from childhood one from about 10 years ago,

content.detailedDescription: We were in a softball game, about 100 persons, and we saw this huge, thing flying very low, going very fast, we all were shock, it was unbelievable, we began talking trying to give a explanation to what we saw but, to date we all about a 100 people are convince that we saw an ufo. one thin i have to say is that the flying thing didn't make any noise, and also the wind resistance that was making was amazing, the wind hit us very hard, i have to say that i don't believe in this thing, but this was very amazing.
content.summary: Lots of colors

content.detailedDescription: I was working at my job and trying to fix a broken garage door. my co-worker stood on a ladder as i stood at the bottom of the ladder to keep it steady. i was watching what he was doing with my head pointed upward to the sky.  in my peripheral vision as i was looking up i spotted a dark circular object in the sky. this object was moving about as fast as an airplane flies. i saw no wings and one flashing red light with an interval of about two seconds between flashes. the object wobbled in a way that is hard to describe in words. after about twenty seconds of us wathing this scene it went behind and above a huge puffy cumulous cloud. we did not see it emerge from the other side of the cloud. it was dusk and partly cloudy but clear skys and good visability made the object very clear and easy to see. the object appeared in a south westerly direction and moved in a straight line west of the initial sighting spot. i was confused about the object because i have never seen an aircraft flying over philadelphia that had no wings and wobbled that way. my initial thought right away was that it may be a weather balloon but it was perfectly circular. my co-worker and i agreed after comparing what we saw that it was not anything that we could identify and highly unusual in the middle of the  city .
content.summary: Saw a dark circular object with one red light for 20 seconds

content.detailedDescription: Dos circulos brillantes se suspendieron al frente de nuestro apartamento frente al mar y luego de unos quince min se perdieron en direccion al horizonte del oceano.
content.summary: Dos circulos brillantes suspendidos

content.detailedDescription: I had two sightings of the same type of aircraft once in greensboro nc back on 2000, and once in moncks corners sc on 2005 in the month of march early in the morning,  both of the objects were, oval shaped with a slight dome on the top, both were clearly visible with a dull off white  colored light that seemed to glow through the crafts hull. the object sighted in greensboro came down from the outer atmosphere dropped down in one motion while turning to level off after it leveled off it seemed to whobble up and down slighty,i counted in my head 8 seconds approx. before loosing sight of it.The object seen in moncks corners was moving across the sky due north, level straight across the sky, it never whobbled. both of the aircraft looked the same in size and shape,and also color.
content.summary: The object dropped down ,and turn to level off in one motion with a high rate of speed...

content.detailedDescription:
I was at work in downtown medford, oregon--peach st & west main st.
i was standing outside in the early morning just as the sky was becoming light.  there were misty little clouds.  i looked up to my right and saw a silver colored space ship disappear into the atmosphere.  it had to be traveling at a terrific speed because it just shot into nothing.  it was my first sighting and i will never forget it.I have never seen anything move that fast.
content.summary: Silver colored craft -shiny looking-round with mound on top

content.detailedDescription:
Ilhabela is an island in brazil. it is a turistic place, near the harbor of s���o sebasti���o, in s���o paulo.

i have a house there where i spend holidays and weekends. i was in the town cause of my vacations and was walking outside the house, preparing to go out on dinner. i cant remember the exact date, but i���m sure that was on 97���s january.

in brazil, at this time, multiple sights of ufo was notice, including a case known as "the varginha incident". this case is known as the brazilian rosswell and, in my opinion, is one of the most significant cases evolving ufos cause there is reports of a two lives ebes.

i was outside the house, preparing myself to go out when i saw a lot of people looking the the sky. the night had clear weather, without clouds. i saw a yellow circle, moving in eliptic way. going up and down very fast. then this "circle" stoped in air for a while and begin changing color. blue, red, white, purple and yellow again.

i saw the flight for about 5 ~ 10 minutes, then the circle disappeared in a fast flight.

no aircraft, at least any known by the public, could flight in that way. neither a weather ballon could.
